original_text: And the people of Gad and the people of Reuben answered, “What the Lord has said to your servants, we will do.
korean_text: 갓 자손과 르우벤 자손이 대답하여 이르되 여호와께서 당신의 종들에게 명령하신 대로 우리가 행할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the people of Gad and the people of Reuben answered
sentences.korean_translation: 갓 지파와 르우벤 지파 사람들이 대답하여

sentences.original_text: What the Lord has said to your servants
